pageContent: Background: African-Americans have twice the risk of non-Hispanic whites for presenting with advanced-stage prostate cancer. To investigate the reasons for this difference, we evaluated the association between race/ethnicity and advanced-stage prostate cancer, adjusting for demographic, socioeconomic, clinical, and pathologic factors.

metaData.source:
Salvage radical prostatectomy for radiorecurrent prostate cancer: indications and results
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16815663/
